/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The road is teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The buildings lining the street are painted in shades of white and gray, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery and light to the cityscape. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of blue, green, and gray.
